Author: pigeonegg

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,639Chapters: 4/9Kudos: 150

Summary: Jason falls asleep trying not to desperately inhale the faint scent of Dick’s cologne, trying not to play the words honey and sweetheart over and over in his head, trying not to think of Dick, shirtless in the bathroom, rolling his eyes and walking out without saying a word. entry.title: You are precious to me.
entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 156,424Chapters: 57/?Kudos: 342

Summary: Damian had been sexually assaulted and after that his father saw the video, he just want to run away. That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. And something is up with Tim but he doesn't know what. Jason is waiting for Dick to give him a proper answer. His hate for Bruce is too strong and he do not feel welcome in their perfect little family. or Everyone is dealing with things and their family is slowly falling appart. Would they succeed to all get along and get over the mistakes of the past?

entry.title: Batcest Time: Revenge
entry.summary:
Author: rhaellu

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,982Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 10

Summary: Jason breaks when Damian asks him to be fucked with a crowbar. Sure, it was in the heat of the moment, but then he just left Damian there, barely staying in the house for days, barely speaking... And Damian finds out Jason was raped and beaten by Joker before dying. After being being attacked by mistake by Jason, he convinces his older brother to tell the rest of the family about what happened.   A few days later, Dick and Damian are caught in the act by Slade. Damian has an idea... why don't they ask him to bring someone back from the dead so they can make them pay?

entry.title: With My Heart on a Trigger
entry.summary:
Author: TrivialCrow

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,463Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 78

Summary: Three years ago, Dick Grayson developed a technology that put him in the crosshairs of dangerous people, and Jason Todd was assigned to protect him. Three years ago, Jason broke the only rule that mattered, and fell in love with a client. That mistake cost him the job, the relationship, and very nearly his life. Now, Dick is back to unveil the same technology that drove him underground, and it’s Jason’s job to ensure the mistakes of the past stay in the past. Dick Grayson is a job, and Jason is a professional. Besides, two weeks on bodyguard duty isn’t enough to heal three years of hurt, and he’s already learned his lesson, hasn’t he?
